Reshape CI between wide/long formats

Source: R/reshape_ci.R
reshape_ci.Rd

Reshape CI between wide/long formats.

reshape_ci(x)

Arguments

x

A data.frame containing CI_low and CI_high.

Examples

library(bayestestR)

x <- data.frame(replicate(4, rnorm(100)))
x <- ci(x, ci = c(0.68, 0.89, 0.95))
reshape_ci(x)
#>   Parameter  CI_low_68 CI_high_68 CI_low_89 CI_high_89 CI_low_95 CI_high_95
#> 1        X1 -0.8940575  1.2552199 -1.325836   1.758930 -1.574481   1.881971
#> 2        X2 -0.8595722  0.9892425 -1.874579   1.444323 -2.148090   1.647831
#> 3        X3 -0.9799275  0.7379612 -1.402296   1.551262 -1.663907   1.997050
#> 4        X4 -1.0922840  1.2029971 -1.869561   1.845423 -1.917318   2.050718
reshape_ci(reshape_ci(x))
#>    Parameter CI     CI_low   CI_high
#> 1         X1 68 -0.8940575 1.2552199
#> 2         X1 89 -1.3258363 1.7589296
#> 3         X1 95 -1.5744810 1.8819707
#> 4         X2 68 -0.8595722 0.9892425
#> 5         X2 89 -1.8745789 1.4443233
#> 6         X2 95 -2.1480899 1.6478308
#> 7         X3 68 -0.9799275 0.7379612
#> 8         X3 89 -1.4022962 1.5512621
#> 9         X3 95 -1.6639072 1.9970505
#> 10        X4 68 -1.0922840 1.2029971
#> 11        X4 89 -1.8695611 1.8454233
#> 12        X4 95 -1.9173177 2.0507179

x <- data.frame(replicate(4, rnorm(100)))
x <- describe_posterior(x, ci = c(0.68, 0.89, 0.95))
reshape_ci(x)
#>   Parameter      Median CI_low_95 CI_high_95  CI_low_68 CI_high_68 CI_low_89
#> 1        X1 -0.08835720 -2.519637   1.606432 -1.0757241  0.9865971 -1.896312
#> 2        X2  0.09256518 -1.743542   2.173607 -0.8621095  1.0879618 -1.655573
#> 3        X3  0.12010857 -1.398669   1.945914 -0.9600175  1.0361084 -1.398669
#> 4        X4 -0.13671403 -1.811679   1.579286 -0.8335641  1.2430468 -1.517307
#>   CI_high_89   pd ROPE_CI ROPE_low ROPE_high ROPE_Percentage
#> 1   1.531930 0.53      89     -0.1       0.1      0.05555556
#> 2   1.730833 0.55      89     -0.1       0.1      0.08888889
#> 3   1.345693 0.52      89     -0.1       0.1      0.04444444
#> 4   1.455842 0.51      89     -0.1       0.1      0.06666667
reshape_ci(reshape_ci(x))
#>    Parameter      Median CI     CI_low   CI_high   pd ROPE_CI ROPE_low
#> 1         X1 -0.08835720 68 -1.0757241 0.9865971 0.53      89     -0.1
#> 2         X1 -0.08835720 89 -1.8963123 1.5319299 0.53      89     -0.1
#> 3         X1 -0.08835720 95 -2.5196367 1.6064319 0.53      89     -0.1
#> 4         X2  0.09256518 68 -0.8621095 1.0879618 0.55      89     -0.1
#> 5         X2  0.09256518 89 -1.6555729 1.7308334 0.55      89     -0.1
#> 6         X2  0.09256518 95 -1.7435422 2.1736069 0.55      89     -0.1
#> 7         X3  0.12010857 68 -0.9600175 1.0361084 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 8         X3  0.12010857 89 -1.3986693 1.3456930 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 9         X3  0.12010857 95 -1.3986693 1.9459140 0.52      89     -0.1
#> 10        X4 -0.13671403 68 -0.8335641 1.2430468 0.51      89     -0.1
#> 11        X4 -0.13671403 89 -1.5173070 1.4558417 0.51      89     -0.1
#> 12        X4 -0.13671403 95 -1.8116786 1.5792862 0.51      89     -0.1
#>    ROPE_high ROPE_Percentage
#> 1        0.1      0.05555556
#> 2        0.1      0.05555556
#> 3        0.1      0.05555556
#> 4        0.1      0.08888889
#> 5        0.1      0.08888889
#> 6        0.1      0.08888889
#> 7        0.1      0.04444444
#> 8        0.1      0.04444444
#> 9        0.1      0.04444444
#> 10       0.1      0.06666667
#> 11       0.1      0.06666667
#> 12       0.1      0.06666667
